info.name: Cat Gifs
info.summary: In our app the script reacts to the button click.
info.description:
In this section of the tutorial, we are going to introduce 4 concepts:
1\. JavaScript dependency list in `package.json`, aka npm packages (Step 2) This JSON file contains all the dependencies that your source JavaScript files need plus some metadata. It can be considered as a local configuration file for npm.
2\. JavaScript sources (step 3) These are the files you write to define what the app's front-end will do.
3\. Vite (step 4) Vite is a tool to compile your source scripts (and their dependencies) to produce the production files.
4\. Production front-end scripts (step 5) They are the final scripts that are actually loaded in your app's front-end (in the browser).
info.author: munisanlo
